title: User Signup - Successful Registration
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with a valid email and password and receive a confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Input valid email and strong password
Submit signup form
Check user is registered, receives confirmation, and is redirected to appropriate onboarding page

title: User Signup - Password Complexity Enforcement
description: Verify that the signup form enforces password rules and shows errors for weak or invalid passwords.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page
Input valid email and invalid password (e.g. too short or missing characters)
Submit signup form
Verify error message describing password complexity requirements is displayed and signup is blocked

title: User Login - Successful Authentication
description: Verify users can log in with valid credentials and maintain authenticated session.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input registered email and correct password
Submit login form
Check user is logged in and redirected to dashboard; session is maintained

title: User Login - Invalid Credential Handling
description: Verify that the system rejects login attempts with incorrect credentials and displays proper error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input registered email with incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify error message about invalid credentials is displayed and login is denied

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify users can request password reset with a registered email and successfully reset their password.

steps.description: Navigate to forgot-password page
Input registered email and submit password reset request
Confirm password reset email sent notification
Follow password reset link and input new valid password
Verify password is successfully updated and user can login with new password

title: Landing Page - Animations and Calculators Load Correctly
description: Verify hero section animations, calculators, and call-to-action elements render and respond properly on initial load across device sizes.

steps.description: Navigate to landing page on desktop browser
Check all animated visuals and inline calculators render and function without errors
Resize browser or use device emulator for mobile view
Verify animations and calculators adapt responsively and remain functional

title: Project Browsing - Real-Time Data Accuracy
description: Verify that browsing community solar projects displays accurate, up-to-date project details and availability.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to project browsing page
Verify project cards display correct names, real-time pricing, available capacity, and relevant details
Simulate backend data update for a projectâ€™s availability and price
Verify UI updates reflect latest availability and pricing without manual refresh

title: Capacity Reservation - Slider Selection and Payment Flow
description: Verify user can select capacity via slider, proceed to payment, and complete reservation successfully with confirmation and summary.

steps.description: Login and navigate to project reservation page
Select a project and adjust capacity slider to desired amount within allowable limits
Verify capacity selection updates summary details and pricing dynamically
Proceed to payment page
Complete payment process via Razorpay simulated integration
Verify payment confirmation is received and reservation success page is shown with correct order details

title: Capacity Reservation - Slider Boundary Conditions
description: Verify the capacity selection slider enforces minimum and maximum capacity constraints and provides appropriate feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to project reservation page
Attempt to set capacity slider below minimum allowed value
Verify slider does not move below minimum and displays validation message if applicable
Attempt to set capacity slider above maximum available capacity
Verify slider restricts to maximum limit and shows appropriate message

title: Utility Connection - Valid State and Provider Mapping
description: Verify users can map their utility accounts correctly by selecting valid state and DISCOM providers with validation.

steps.description: Login and navigate to utility connection page
Input valid account details and select valid state and corresponding DISCOM provider
Submit utility connection form
Verify utility account is mapped successfully and confirmation message is displayed

title: Utility Connection - Invalid State and Provider Validation
description: Verify that invalid combinations of state and DISCOM provider inputs are rejected with meaningful error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to utility connection page
Select state and attempt to input a DISCOM provider not valid for that state
Submit form
Verify error message displayed indicating invalid state-provider mapping and submission blocked

title: Dashboard - Real-Time Capacity and Savings Monitoring
description: Verify that the dashboard displays accurate and real-time updates on user's reserved solar capacity, cost savings, and CO2 reduction stats.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard page
Verify initial data for reserved capacity, cost savings, and environmental impact is loaded correctly
Simulate updates to user allocations and savings backend data
Verify dashboard stats update live without manual refresh

title: Bills Management - Display Bills with Solar Credits Applied
description: Verify that user's electricity bills display correctly with solar credits automatically applied and reflect updated balances.

steps.description: Login and navigate to bills page
Verify bill details show original amount, solar credit deductions, and final payable amount correctly
Select bills with variable credit amounts
Verify solar credit calculations are consistent and accurate for varying bill cycles

title: Bills Management - Payment Processing
description: Verify users can make payments on outstanding bills using simulated payment gateway and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to bills page with outstanding balance
Select a bill and initiate payment process
Complete payment using simulated Razorpay payment integration
Confirm payment success message and updated bill status reflected on UI

title: API Routes - Authorization and Error Handling
description: Verify that secure API endpoints enforce proper authorization and return meaningful error responses for unauthorized or malformed requests.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected API route without authentication
Verify 401 Unauthorized response is returned
Access API route with valid authentication but malformed input parameters
Verify appropriate 400 Bad Request or descriptive error returned
Access API route with valid authentication and input
Verify 200 OK response with expected data

title: Session Management and Security
description: Verify sessions are securely managed with timeout, token renewal, and proper logout behavior enforcing access control.

steps.description: Login successfully and verify session characteristics (expiry time, token)
Simulate idle timeout and verify user is logged out or prompted to renew session
Perform logout action
Verify session is invalidated and protected pages require re-authentication

title: Input Validation and XSS Protection
description: Verify all user inputs across forms are sanitized and validated to prevent XSS and injection attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to input script tags and special characters in form fields (signup, login, utility connection, reservation)
Verify input sanitizer and XSS protection libraries prevent script execution and show validation errors when appropriate

title: Responsive UI - Cross Device Compatibility
description: Verify the entire web application UI, including dashboard, reservation flows, and landing page, renders correctly and remains functional on multiple device sizes and orientations.

steps.description: Open application on desktop screen
Verify elements align correctly and all interactive components function
Open application in mobile emulator or real device phones/tablets
Verify UI adapts fluidly, menus collapse or stack properly, and touch interactions are smooth

title: Refund Requests - Policy Compliance and Processing
description: Verify users can submit refund requests through the refund management page and that requests are processed according to the refund policy.

steps.description: Login and navigate to refund page
Submit refund request for a recent reservation
Verify refund request is accepted only if policy criteria are met and user receives confirmation
Attempt to submit refund beyond allowed conditions
Verify request is rejected with clear explanation

title: Help Center and FAQ Accessibility
description: Verify the help center and FAQ pages load quickly, are accessible with screen readers, and answers are accurate.

steps.description: Navigate to help center page
Verify FAQ questions and answers are readable and structured
Use screen reader to navigate help center content
Verify ARIA tags and landmarks support accessibility standards
